definition: A number expressing the central or typical value in a set of data.
example: The average age of the participants was 30.
example_translation: Średni wiek uczestników wynosił 30 lat.

definition: All the people in a family or group who live together in a house.
example: There are three households in this building.
example_translation: W tym budynku są trzy gospodarstwa domowe.

definition: A distinctive attribute or aspect of something.
example: The new model has several innovative features.
example_translation: Nowy model ma kilka innowacyjnych cech.

definition: The act or instance of comparing.
example: The comparisons between the two datasets were interesting.
example_translation: Porównania między dwoma zbiorami danych były interesujące.

definition: Easily perceived or understood; clear, self-evident, or apparent.
example: It was obvious that she was upset.
example_translation: Było oczywiste, że była zdenerwowana.

definition: In the direction of.
example: She walked towards the park.
example_translation: Poszła w kierunku parku.

definition: To examine the similarities and/or differences.
example: He compared the results to the previous year's data.
example_translation: Porównał wyniki do danych z poprzedniego roku.

definition: Especially; in particular.
example: Several people were notably absent from the meeting.
example_translation: Kilka osób było w szczególności nieobecnych na spotkaniu.

definition: A smaller amount of; not as much.
example: He ate less than he usually does.
example_translation: Zjadł mniej niż zazwyczaj.

definition: A small amount less.
example: There were slightly fewer people at the concert this year.
example_translation: Na koncercie w tym roku było nieznacznie mniej ludzi.

definition: Of the least size, amount, or degree.
example: The smallest detail was not overlooked.
example_translation: Najmniejszy szczegół nie został pominięty.

definition: A significantly smaller amount or degree.
example: The temperatures this winter were much lower than last year.
example_translation: Temperatury tej zimy były znacznie niższe niż w zeszłym roku.

definition: Two times; on two occasions.
example: She called twice yesterday.
example_translation: Dzwoniła dwukrotnie wczoraj.

definition: A greater amount or number of something.
example: We need more time to complete the project.
example_translation: Potrzebujemy więcej czasu na ukończenie projektu.

definition: Of the largest amount or degree.
example: He achieved the greatest success of his career.
example_translation: Osiągnął największy sukces w swojej karierze.

definition: The least share or part of something.
example: A smallest proportion of the budget was allocated to education.
example_translation: Najmniejsza część budżetu została przeznaczona na edukację.

definition: Three out of four equal parts.
example: Three-quarters of the students passed the exam.
example_translation: 3/4 uczniów zdało egzamin.

definition: One of two equal parts of something.
example: He ate half of the cake.
example_translation: Zjadł połowę ciasta.

word: A third of the number of
definition: One of three equal parts of the quantity.
example: A third of the number of attendees were absent.
example_translation: 1/3 liczby uczestników była nieobecna.

definition: Forty percent of something.
example: 40% of the respondents agreed with the statement.
example_translation: 40% respondentów zgodziło się z tym stwierdzeniem.

definition: More than fifty percent of something.
example: Over 50% of the population voted in the election.
example_translation: Ponad 50% populacji głosowało w wyborach.

definition: Five times as many as something.
example: There were five times the number of people at the event compared to last year.
example_translation: Na wydarzeniu było pięć razy więcej ludzi niż w zeszłym roku.

definition: Exceeding a certain number or amount.
example: There were more than 100 participants in the workshop.
example_translation: Na warsztatach było ponad 100 uczestników.

definition: Nearly twice the amount.
example: The new store made almost double the sales compared to the old one.
example_translation: Nowy sklep osiągnął prawie dwukrotnie większą sprzedaż w porównaniu do starego.

definition: Nearly ten times the number of something.
example: There were almost ten times as many visitors to the website this month.
example_translation: W tym miesiącu było prawie 10 razy więcej odwiedzających na stronie internetowej.

definition: A significantly larger number of men constituted.
example: Considerably more men made up the workforce in the factory.
example_translation: Znacznie więcej mężczyzn stanowiło siłę roboczą w fabryce.

definition: Approximately one third more than a given amount.
example: About a third more people attended the concert this year.
example_translation: Około 1/3 więcej ludzi uczestniczyło w koncercie w tym roku.

definition: A smaller number compared to something else.
example: There were not as many attendees as expected.
example_translation: Nie było tylu uczestników, ile się spodziewano.

definition: A small amount less than something.
example: The budget was slightly less than last year's.
example_translation: Budżet był nieznacznie mniejszy niż w zeszłym roku.

word: Was approximately four times as many..as..
definition: Roughly four times the number of something compared to another.
example: There was approximately four times as many applicants as last year.
example_translation: Było około 4 razy więcej aplikantów niż w zeszłym roku.

definition: To go beyond a set limit.
example: The number of visitors exceeded our expectations.
example_translation: Liczba odwiedzających przekroczyła nasze oczekiwania.

word: To be distinguished FROM something else
definition: To be recognized as different from another thing.
example: Her work is easily distinguished from her peers' because of her unique style.
example_translation: Jej praca jest łatwo odróżniana od prac jej rówieśników ze względu na unikalny styl.

definition: To mention or allude to something.
example: This chart refers to the data collected last year.
example_translation: Ten wykres odnosi się do danych zebranych w zeszłym roku.

word: To be seen IN contrast with sth
translation: być widzianym w kontraście do czegoś
definition: To be noticed as different when compared with something else.
example: His calm demeanor can be seen in contrast with her energetic personality.
example_translation: Jego spokojne zachowanie można zauważyć w kontraście do jej energicznej osobowości.

definition: Created or formed by drawing a comparison with something else.
example: The term 'mouse' was coined by analogy with the small rodent.
example_translation: Termin 'mysz' został ukuty przez analogię do małego gryzonia.

definition: Similar or comparable to something else in certain respects.
example: The wings of a bat are analogous to the wings of a bird.
example_translation: Skrzydła nietoperza są analogiczne do skrzydeł ptaka.

definition: Relying or contingent upon something.
example: The outcome of the experiment may vary depending on the conditions.
example_translation: Wynik eksperymentu może się różnić w zależności od warunków.

definition: The way in which two or more things are connected.
example: The study examines the relationships between different variables.
example_translation: Badanie analizuje związki między różnymi zmiennymi.

word: The same applies TO sth else
definition: A statement or rule is equally true for another situation or thing.
example: What we discussed about marketing strategies applies to sales techniques as well.
example_translation: To, co omawialiśmy na temat strategii marketingowych, dotyczy również technik sprzedaży.

definition: In or into the space separating two points, objects, or regions.
example: The ball is between the two chairs.
example_translation: Piłka jest pomiędzy dwoma krzesłami.

definition: Situated in, or being a part of a larger group.
example: She was among the first to arrive.
example_translation: Była wśród pierwszych, którzy przybyli.
